summary: Version 0.1 of Audrienne as a follower - WIP
descriptionHtml:
This is version 0.1 of the Audrienne Follower Mod. It is still heavy work in progress.

Some folks asked me to make a follower out of my "Audrienne - Breton Girl" char and so I did. I have never created a follower in the creation kit before, so that was a real first timer for me.

You can find her in the Bannered Mare in Whiterun, where she spends her spare time with dancing and drinking alcoholic beverages. Time to give her some work, didn´t you think? She wears a ebony armor (without helmet), a ebony bow and a ebony longsword.

The mod is still WIP and I plan to add some changes with the next releases, like making her a merc for hire and balancing her stats.

Installation is really a bit uncomfortable at the moment, I have to apologize for my lack of skill with the construction kit.

I encountered a ugly problem, where facial textures aren´t loaded properly. Maybe a bug, maybe I forgot some setting. Maybe someone with more experience with the CK could have a look at it. :-)

For the moment you need to do the following steps to make her work as intended...

You need:

CBBE 3.3 with activated face pack 2666
OblivionHairPackAIO 22598
The Eyes Of Beauty 13722 (optional)

Edit: en3raider pointed me to my mistake. I made a new NMM-friendly version, that should work without further steps. So I removed the rest of the readme, because it is obsolete. Thx for the jolt. :)

Please let me know if there are any problems left.
author: Dennis05
